entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
